search.query: source="showcase_simple_search.json" host="DESKTOP-G07RLH1" index="queries" sourcetype="my_json_no_timestamp" | eval sourcetype=json,_raw=replace(_raw," },"," }"), _raw="{ "._raw." }" | eval _raw=replace(_raw,"\\\\\"","$$") | search "- Live" | rex field=_raw "\"value\"\s*\:\s*\"(?<value>[^\"]*)\"" | rex field=_raw "\"label\"\s*\:\s*\"(?<label>[^\"]*)\"" | eval value=replace(value,"\$$","\"") | table label, value

| datamodel Change Account_Management | spath output=all calculations{} | mvexpand all | spath input="all" output=fields outputFields{} | spath input="all" output=expression expression | spath input="all" output=calculationType calculationType | append [ | datamodel Change Account_Management | spath output=fields fields{} ] | mvexpand fields | eval _time = now(), _raw = fields | spath | rename comment.* AS comment_* | rename *{}* AS ** | table comment_* calculationType, expression, displayName, editable, fieldName, multivalue, owner, required,type | fields - _raw | search owner!="BaseEvent" AND type!="objectCount" AND type!="childCount"
